components.templateData:
<dp-day-calendar #dayCalendar
                 (onGoToCurrent)="onGoToCurrent.emit()"
                 (onLeftNav)="onLeftNavClick($event)"
                 (onRightNav)="onRightNavClick($event)"
                 (onSelect)="dateSelected($event)"
                 [config]="componentConfig"
                 [displayDate]="displayDate"
                 [ngModel]="_selected"
                 [theme]="theme">
</dp-day-calendar>
<dp-time-select #timeSelect
                (onChange)="timeChange($event)"
                [config]="componentConfig"
                [ngModel]="_selected"
                [theme]="theme">
</dp-time-select>

components.name: FormComponent

propertiesClass.name: formConfig
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
[
    {
      name: 'name',
      label: 'Name',
      type: 'text',
      value: '',
      validators: [Validators.required],
      classConfig: 'form-control mt-2',
    },
    {
      name: 'email',
      label: 'Email',
      type: 'email',
      value: '',
      validators: [Validators.required, Validators.email],
      classConfig: 'form-control mt-2',
    },
    {
      name: 'dob',
      label: 'Date of Birth',
      type: 'date',
      value: '',
      validators: [Validators.required],
      classConfig: 'mt-3',
    },
  ]

components.templateData:
<form [formGroup]="form" (ngSubmit)="submit()">
  <app-form-field [inputOneConfig]="formConfig[0]"></app-form-field>
  <app-form-field [inputOneConfig]="formConfig[1]"></app-form-field>
  <app-form-field [inputOneConfig]="formConfig[2]"></app-form-field>
  <app-address-form [form]="form"></app-address-form>
  <!-- <app-date-picker [form]="form" controlName="dateOfBirth" label="Date of Birth"></app-date-picker> -->
  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" [disabled]="form.invalid">
    Submit
  </button>
</form>

  [legend]="showLegend"
  [showXAxisLabel]="showXAxisLabel"
  [showYAxisLabel]="showYAxisLabel"
  [xAxisLabel]="xAxisLabel"
  [yAxisLabel]="yAxisLabel">
</ngx-charts-bar-vertical>

 simple tables Dynamic Class Directive

This directive is used to add classes to the input element based on the object passed to it.

Reusable Reactive Form

The `FormComponent` is a reusable component that includes a sub-form for addresses (`app-address-form`), which is also reusable. It allows for dynamically creating form fields via configurable sub-components (`app-form-field`). The form is reactive and can be submitted via the `submit` method.

Custom date picker

Date range picker

Available parameters

Datepicker parameter inputs
Input name Description Available options
dateOptions Input JSON object containing the options related to the date picker
  • dateFormat:string (default 'dd/MM/yyyy')
  • selectedEndDate:Date (default undefined)
  • selectedStartDate:Date (default undefined)
  • disabledWeekends:boolean (default true)
  • disableRangePciker:boolean (default false)
  • isStepperYearShown:boolean (default true)
  • offsetYearsMenu:integer (default 5)
  • isSelectionDayAfterCurrentDayEnable:boolean (default false)
